short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a very simple mouse gestures program

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a very simple mouse gestures program

A mouse gestures extension to give basic mouse and rocker gesture functionality. No ads, no spyware.

Set gestures in the options page. On first install, you must go to the options page and save configuration.

Mac and Linux users: double right click to open context. Please note that the functionality has not been tested by the current maintainer.

Version 1.6 8/20/2024: Updated to Chrome Extension v3 for continued compatibility with modern Chrome versions.

Note: This extension is a temporary alternative to the original miniGesture. If the original author releases an official update, this version may be unpublished or left as is. In that case, any bugs or issues may not be fixed.
